snippet: The Justice Department says that states are free to legalize pot, but that the government will be watching.
abstract: Editorial praises Justice Department for announcing a 'trust but verify' approach to states permitting growth, sale and possession of marijuana; holds it is one step toward sanity in the enforcement of drug laws, and indicates the nation is approaching a solution to its costly and misguided conduct in the war on drugs.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department says that states are free to legalize pot, but that the government will be watching.

headline.main: A Saner Approach on Drug Laws
headline.print_headline: A Saner Approach on Drug Laws
